MetadataField.Name: Full Record View Count
MetadataField.Label: Full Record Views
MetadataField.Description: This field is used by the Metrics Recorder plugin to store a count of the number of times the full record page for a resource has been viewed by non-privileged users.

MetadataField.Name: URL Field Click Count
MetadataField.Label: Resource URL Clicks
MetadataField.Description: This field is used by the Metrics Recorder plugin to store a count of the number of times the primary URL for a resource has been clicked by non-privileged users.
